annotations.description: We shot this one a while ago. And while I'm not really one to pretend that Tiki is just for summer, I am glad we're getting it out. This one Is a fantastic J...
annotations.title: A Little Extra Tiki With The Lost Lake

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Jamaica Rum
.25oz (7.5ml) Campari
.25oz (7.5ml) Maraschino Liqueur
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Passionfruit Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Pineapple Juice
Pineaple Slice, Fronds and orchid Garnish
Umbrella Optional

Whip shake and pour into large glass. 
Top with crushed ice and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fY6b940yrj4
title: Lost Lake
